renameNC¶

fyodor.renameNC(directory)[source]¶

Rename GOES-R .nc files downloaded via subscription. It removes the order number at the start of the filename. This must be done so that the pwv function can retrieve measurements in chronological order.

Parameters

Directory (str) – Directory path containing the files.

fyodor
